about_the_game:
Gameplay Mechanics

  • Identity and Passport Check: Examine passengers' documents, detect forged documents and observe suspicious behavior.

  • Baggage and Body Search: Check baggage, detect suspicious objects and frisk passengers with advanced scanning devices.

  • Interrogation and Analysis: Get suspects to confess to crimes or prove their innocence by asking the right questions when interrogating them.

  • Inflight Security: Ensure security from the airport terminal to the airplane. Identify and neutralize suspicious persons inside the aircraft.[/][/*]

  • Enemy Detection and Tracking: Monitor suspicious behavior using security cameras and take immediate action.

  • Dynamic Scenarios: Solve various crime cases such as theft, drug trafficking, murder, etc. Each mission requires a different challenge and strategy.

  • Time and Resource Management: Maintain order during peak flight hours by making quick and effective decisions.

    Additional Features

    • Various Tools and Technologies: Use various equipment such as metal detectors, narcotics dogs, fingerprint scanners, etc.

    • Social Dynamics: When communicating with passengers, wrong decisions can lead to passenger backlash. Think carefully about the consequences of your decisions.

    • Team Management: Assign tasks to other security personnel and collaborate to solve major incidents.

    Realistic Airport Atmosphere

    Airport Police Simulator presents in detail the complex and bustling structure of a modern airport. With dynamic passenger behavior, challenging scenarios and suspense-filled moments, you will feel completely in the heart of the airport.

    Are you skilled enough to ensure safety in the air and on the ground? Prove it in Airport Police Simulator!

short_description: Airport Police Simulator offers players the opportunity to take on the task of maintaining security at a busy airport. As a police officer, your goal is to detect banned substances, catch criminals and ensure that every passenger travels safely.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish
